77| Cash To Sundries Dr
13| General Charges recd for a bbl Flour sold to T. Banks $6 3.0.0

17| Ditto recd of WA for 100~ Bacon 5.0.0
|9|4|3|

paid for fixing 9 Scythe Blades a 10/ |4|10||
